title.narrative: 4.2 CHILD FRIENDLY CITY INITIATIVE - SPG

description.narrative: Strengthened local capacity to establish, promote and lead the Child Friendly City Initiative in HCMC, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Reducing Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Innovation, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, concrete actions are taken by civil society, the corporate sector and the public for social changes that address critical child rights concerns

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened local capacity to establish, promote and lead the Child Friendly City Initiative in HCMC

description.narrative: Strategic partnerships with local governments and youth-led organizations were strengthened to the improve the promotion of child rights and civic engagement among adolescents. This contributed to the rollout of the Child-Friendly City Initiative in Ho Chi Minh City and Da Nang. | Status:Met | As-of Date:03/02/2022
